title: Background Jobs
summary: Taking a deep dive into Background Jobs, a new library for .NET 8 Apps for simplifying task scheduling and management

title: ServiceStack v8.4 Release
summary: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.4 covering Background Jobs, SQLite Request Logs, Scalable SQLite Apps and more!

title: ServiceStack v8.3 Release
summary: The latest features and improvements in ServiceStack v8.3 covering Commands Feature, API Keys, Integrated Admin UIs and more!

title: ServiceStack v8.2 Release
summary: All about ServiceStack v8.2 Release new Vue & React Vite SPA Tailwind Markdown powered Templates, integrated Identity Auth, new Kotlin Compose Multiplatform template and new Vite Press Plugin

title: ServiceStack v8.1 Release
summary: ServiceStack v8.1 is here with a host of new features including full integration with Identity Auth, ASP .NET IOC, Endpoint Routing, System.Text.Json APIs, enhanced Admin UIs with JWT support, and much more!
